templates.name: HTTP CONNECT
templates.description: Standard HTTP CONNECT method for tunneling
templates.template:
CONNECT [SNI] HTTP/1.1
Host: [SNI]
X-Online-Host: [SNI]
X-Forward-Host: [SNI]
Connection: Keep-Alive
User-Agent: [USER_AGENT]
Proxy-Connection: Keep-Alive

templates.name: HTTP GET
templates.description: HTTP GET method with upgrade headers
templates.template:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: [SNI]
X-Online-Host: [SNI]
X-Forward-Host: [SNI]
Connection: upgrade
Upgrade: websocket
User-Agent: [USER_AGENT]

templates.name: WebSocket Upgrade
templates.template:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: [SNI]
Upgrade: websocket
Connection: Upgrade
Sec-WebSocket-Key: [WEBSOCKET_KEY]
Sec-WebSocket-Version: 13
X-Online-Host: [SNI]
User-Agent: [USER_AGENT]

templates.name: HTTP Proxy
templates.description: HTTP proxy method for direct connection
templates.template:
CONNECT [HOST]:[PORT] HTTP/1.1
Host: [SNI]
X-Online-Host: [SNI]
Proxy-Connection: Keep-Alive
User-Agent: [USER_AGENT]

templates.name: Custom Inject
templates.description: Custom injection method with multiple headers
templates.template:
[METHOD] [SNI] HTTP/1.1
Host: [SNI]
X-Online-Host: [SNI]
X-Forward-Host: [SNI]
X-Real-IP: [SNI]
Connection: Keep-Alive
User-Agent: [USER_AGENT]

templates.name: Facebook Zero
templates.template:
CONNECT [SNI] HTTP/1.1
Host: zero.facebook.com
X-Online-Host: [SNI]
X-Facebook-Zero: true
Connection: Keep-Alive
User-Agent: [USER_AGENT]

templates.name: WhatsApp CDN
templates.template:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: [SNI]
X-WhatsApp-CDN: true
X-Online-Host: [SNI]
Connection: upgrade
Upgrade: websocket
User-Agent: [USER_AGENT]

templates.name: SSL Bump
templates.description: SSL bumping method for HTTPS tunneling
templates.template:
CONNECT [HOST]:[PORT] HTTP/1.1
Host: [SNI]
X-Online-Host: [SNI]
X-SSL-Bump: true
Proxy-Connection: Keep-Alive
User-Agent: [USER_AGENT]
